column4: Ubuntu 8.04. I have a broken package. I try to fix the problem with Synaptic, but I can't.
The error message is 'BrokenCount > 0'. I try the command 'apt-get -f install', but it failed too.
I think the command is "apt-get install -f"
you could launch synaptic, click the button on the left side that says "Custom Filters" select broken and then try to re-install the package that way
